Spoiler: Modkilled
Please don't get modkilled


(bold indicates player has confirmed, * denote prods)

General Rules (Violators will suffer heavy consequences):
  1. All site-wide rules apply. In particular, no discussion of ongoing games is allowed.
  2. No discussion of this game allowed anywhere outside this game thread (which includes PMs), unless otherwise stated by your Role PM.
  3. My Mod color is blue (#0000FF). Do not use it.
  4. Do not quote your Role PM or any other PMs from the Mod, real or fabricated.
  5. Play to your win condition. This means do not claim scum, regardless of alignment or seriousness.
  6. No personal attacks.
  7. Do not edit or delete your post, even if you have the ability to do so.
  8. No using encrypted text, small text, bright-coloured text, or otherwise make it hard to see what you are writing.
  9. No using provable randomness. This means no dice tags.
  10. Use common sense. There are probably many other rules but I forgot about them. If it feels wrong, please don't do it. If in doubt, contact the Mod.
  11. Expressing intent to break a rule, fake breaking a rule, finding loopholes in a rule or encouraging someone to break a rule is equivalent to breaking the rule itself and will suffer similar consequences.

Voting and Lynching rules:
  1. Day phases last a maximum of 14 days.
  2. Night phases last exactly 2 days (48 hours)
  3. To vote someone, use the vote tags (VOTE: BNLp), but I'll accept bold text as well (Vote: Bullet)
  4. Votes to No Lynch are accepted, indicated by VOTE: No Lynch or Vote: No Lynch.
  5. To unvote, use the unvote tag (UNVOTE: ), or bold (Unvote), but I'll accept VOTE: Unvote as well.
  6. Votes in quote tags will not be counted. Please do not put votes in any other tags, they will not be counted either.
  7. It takes a strict majority (half of all players plus 1, rounded down) to achieve a lynch. It takes a weak majority (half of all players, rounded up) to No Lynch.
  8. If a majority was not met by deadline, a No Lynch will happen.
  9. When a lynch has been achieved, it is final, and any further votes or unvotes will not count. Everyone (including the lynched person) may continue to post until I post the lynch scene.
  10. When you are dead, do not post, game related or not. This means no ‘bah' posts.
  11. If the Mod has made an error in the vote count, please post the error in thread.

Activity and Replacements:
  1. 48 hours without a post will incur a prod.
  2. If you do not respond to the prod by posting in the main thread within 24 hours, you will be replaced.
  3. Three prods and I will also replace you.
  4. If a replacement happens near deadline, I may grant an extension. This will be 24 hours long, and will happen only up to once per day phase. I reserve the right not to give this extension if I feel it's being abused.
  5. If a replacement happens at Night, I will freeze the deadline until a replacement is found.

Setup Information:
  1. This is a 13 player Normal closed setup. It follows the Normal game guidelines.
  2. It is guaranteed that at least one player is initially aligned with the Mafia, and more than half the players are initially aligned with the Town.
  3. It is also guaranteed that at least one player is a Vanilla Townie, who will receive the role PM as shown below.
  4. Natural Action Resolution is in effect.
  5. Please submit Night actions on time. Overdue Night actions will not count, even if I haven't resolved them yet.
  6. If you believe the Mod has made an error in resolving effects, please PM me.

Sample role PM:

Spoiler: VT Role PM
Welcome to Mini 1757, XXX, you are a Vanilla Townie

Abilities:
During the day, you may vote someone to get him lynched.

Win condition:
You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one pro-town player alive.

Game thread is [url=link]here[/url].

Please confirm by replying to this role PM with your full role.
All Role PMs have been made, but it's late now so I'll be sending the Role PMs tomorrow.

Sending Role PMs now.

All Role PMs have been sent. Everyone has 48 hours from this post to confirm. Game will start when 11/13 people have confirmed.

13/13 have confirmed.

All players have confirmed. Day 1 begins now!

Dwlee99, you will have to explain how me allowing your claim to be verified causes me to fall anywhere on your scumdar; if not for me, for others who you would want to join your vote. From my point of view, you made a claim, and I decided to see if it developed into anything or not.

It was going to be interesting if your claim was real because a) it was fast and b) it is essentially an OMGUS. It certainly was going to limit voting and seriously impact Day 1, and for what? A two-vote wagon on you?

It still is interesting because now instead of asserting TheCow as your target, I, your other voter, am now your person of interest because my response was "interesting bad". It still sounds pretty OMGUS to me, and it is a shame that despite you arguing I am perhaps up to no good, you keep your RVS vote on Nosferatu instead of following any poor rhetoric on me. I think your vote should follow your heart (and some good arguments).

I wish, Dwlee99, for example, you at least argued I left an empty vote parked on Boonskiies to form a counter-wagon on you to combat either the Nosferatu or Chumba wagon. I actually shifted votes because I was not a fan of getting someone to L-1 so early, but hey, perception is everything, and the other explanation sounds plausible.

Instead, you brought nothing and that saddens me. I did not even need to bring up LAL to vote you, Dwlee99, but I can suggest it is a valid reason now for others to vote you.

Guys, I am also game for another lame policy lynch regarding inactives, so Boonskiies is still rates that for me. Piling votes up on inactives is a great way to generate activity, either from the victim, the people hounding, or the people defending. However, that really requires abandoning everything else we have going on and can make for a lame Day 2 if it goes smoothly.
